attributes.additional_details: Because it causes unnecessary pain and there are also much ether alternatives that are not only much cheaper, but also more effective.
attributes.background: Put a permanent ban on animal testing because it violates their rights. 115M animals are killed each year because of this. They intoxicate them, injure them, and then kill them after lots of pain and torture.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: 

Ban animal testing for human products and medicines

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700262
